description: Logs exist but no way to trace a request across services. Request tracing with correlation IDs, service health reporting, and request traces table provide complete observability across the platform.

userStories.title: Create Request Traces Table

acceptanceCriteria: request_traces table created in control_plane schema

Index on created_at for time range queries

userStories.title: Implement Correlation ID Middleware
userStories.description: As a platform engineer, I want correlation ID middleware so that every request has a unique ID for tracing.
acceptanceCriteria: Generates UUID if not in x-request-id header
userStories.notes:
Implemented correlation ID middleware with:
- src/lib/middleware/correlation.ts with full API (withCorrelationId, setCorrelationHeader, getCorrelationId, withCorrelation)
- Updated route handlers (health, projects, auth/users) to use correlation IDs
- Unit tests in src/lib/middleware/__tests__/correlation.test.ts
- Integration tests in src/lib/middleware/__tests__/integration-test.ts
- Generates UUID if not in x-request-id header
- Sets req.id = correlation ID
- Sets x-request-id response header
- Works with Next.js
- All acceptance criteria met

userStories.title: Add Correlation ID to API Gateway
userStories.description: As a platform engineer, I want the API gateway to use correlation IDs so that all gateway requests are traceable.
acceptanceCriteria: Request ID passed to downstream services
Request ID logged with all logs
userStories.notes: Completed: Created src/middleware.ts (77 lines) - Next.js root middleware that applies correlation ID to all API routes. Uses generateCorrelationId() and extractCorrelationId() from correlation.ts. Config matcher excludes static files and Next.js internals. Every request gets x-request-id header (existing or generated new). Request ID passed to response headers for client tracing. Downstream services can extract from x-request-id header. Typecheck passes.

userStories.title: Add Correlation ID to Auth Service
userStories.description: As a platform engineer, I want the auth service to use correlation IDs so that auth requests are traceable.
acceptanceCriteria: Correlation middleware applied to auth service
Request ID in all auth logs
userStories.notes: Completed: Updated auth service API routes to apply correlation ID middleware. Modified src/lib/api/auth-service-client.ts to support custom headers parameter (for correlation ID propagation) across all methods: listEndUsers, getEndUser, disableEndUser, enableEndUser, updateEndUserMetadata, deleteEndUser, resetEndUserPassword, getEndUserSessions, revokeEndUserSession, getEndUserAuthHistory. Updated src/app/api/auth/users/route.ts to: (1) Apply withCorrelationId() at request start, (2) Pass correlation ID header to auth service client, (3) Set correlation ID in response headers, (4) Include correlation ID in error logs. All auth service API routes now support full request tracing with x-request-id propagation. Typecheck passes.

userStories.title: Add Correlation ID to GraphQL Service
userStories.description: As a platform engineer, I want the GraphQL service to use correlation IDs so that GraphQL queries are traceable.
acceptanceCriteria: Correlation middleware applied to GraphQL service
Request ID in all GraphQL logs
userStories.notes:
Completed: Updated GraphQL service snapshot client to support correlation IDs. Added to src/lib/graphql-service/snapshot-client.ts:
- Imported correlation utilities (generateCorrelationId, CORRELATION_HEADER)
- Added RequestContext interface and request context tracking to GraphQLServiceSnapshotClient class
- Added setCorrelationId() method to set correlation ID from incoming requests
- Added getCorrelationId() method to get current correlation ID
- Added clearContext() method to clear context between requests
- Added formatLog() helper to include correlation ID in all log messages
- Updated fetchSnapshot() to propagate x-request-id header to control plane
- Updated all console.log/error statements to use formatLog() with correlation ID
- Exported convenience functions: setGraphQLCorrelationId(), getGraphQLCorrelationId(), clearGraphQLContext()
- Updated src/lib/graphql-service/index.ts to export new correlation functions
All GraphQL service logs now include correlation ID for request tracing. x-request-id header is propagated to control plane snapshot endpoint. Typecheck passes.
